alert.note: Alert for Brown; Edmunds; McPherson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 2:38PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Edmunds, west central Brown and southeastern McPherson Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 338 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Long Lake Colony to near Cravens Corner to near Mina to near North Scatterwood Lake. Movement was west at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Deerfield Colony and Cravens Corner around 350 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Ipswich, Plainview Colony and Pembrook Colony. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
